system.effect:
Reduces Toughness Bonus gained as a result of Unnatural Toughness by X. Doesn't reduce base Toughness Bonus. 
(EG: Unnatural Toughness(+4) with TB 4 would result in TB 8, Felling (5) would reduce this back to TB 4)

description.value: Reduces Toughness Bonus gained as a result of Unnatural Toughness by X. Doesn't reduce base Toughness Bonus. (EG: Unnatural Toughness(+4) with TB 4 would result in TB 8, Felling (5) would reduce this back to TB 4)
